option.isles-addons.enable-custom-messag: Enable/Disable the Custom Resource Drop message (shows XP)
option.isles-addons.enable-rare-fishing-: Enable/Disable the Rare Fishing Title on a rare resource drop
option.isles-addons.enable-green-qte-not: Get notified in chat if there is a Green QTE nearby
option.isles-addons.enable-purple-qte-no: Get notified in chat if there is a Purple QTE nearby
option.isles-addons.enable-gold-qte-noti: Get notified in chat if there is a Gold QTE nearby
